response.overview: "Bogan Jesus (2020)" is a comedy special that offers a hilarious and irreverent take on Australian culture and society. Heath Franklin, in his iconic character as Chopper, takes center stage to deliver a performance that is equal parts edgy and uproarious.  In this outrageous special, Chopper dives into a wide range of topics, from politics and religion to pop culture and everyday absurdities. His humor is characterized by sharp wit, unfiltered language, and a fearless approach to comedy that leaves no subject untouched.  Chopper's charismatic stage presence and unapologetic persona draw the audience into his world of comedy. He fearlessly challenges conventions and pushes boundaries, all while delivering side-splitting one-liners and stories that keep the laughter flowing.
response.title: Bogan Jesus
